text: Epperley is the eponymous debut studio album by the Oklahoma band Epperley. The song "Shy" was featured in an episode of Buffy the Vampire Slayer. ==Track listing== All songs and lyrics by Epperley. # "Nice Guy Eddie" – 4:55 # "Golden Shower" – 3:51 # "If" – 2:44 # "Ride Away" – 3:32 # "Pulse" – 2:57 # "Wait" – 5:03 # "Motivator" – 4:10 # "Buzz On" – 3:21 # "Love Day" – 2:56 # "Shy" – 4:47 # "Its Universal" – 3:52 # "Disillusioned Jesus" – 6:21 ==Personnel== *R.
